note.p: Burial: Otterden church, near Charing, Kent
Education: Mr Rymer's School at Durham; Christ's College, Cambridge; BA (1721), MA (1724); Incorporated at Oxford (1734)
Career: Fellow of Christ's (1722); ordained deacon and priest (1737); Rector of Leake, Nottinghamshire (1737-1770); Prebendary of Southwell (1753-1770)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB (father's entry); Venn; Foster; Le Neve
